attributes.action: Give the Young Theatre ten million pounds to revenovate/create a theatre for the group and community and upgrade the equipment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like ten million pounds to create a theatre for young people so the youth of today can have fun and take people off the streets.I would upgrade the equipment so that we can create amazing shows.or i would like to renovate a local centre to create it the perfect venue.
Its my dream and im only 15.
